message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's in great condition and worth a lot more. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the condition of the product, but I can't go above $105. Looking forward to your response!
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $105 is a little too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $110. This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident you won't regret it.
